about.commitment_body: We pledge to maintain a discrimination-free platform where everyone can find housing with dignity and respect. If you encounter any issues, we're here to help.
about.lead: We make it simple for expats to find welcoming housing across Estonia.
about.mission_body: Remove friction and bias from renting by connecting expat-friendly owners with people who need a home.
about.story_body: Xpatly was born from a simple idea: finding a home shouldn't be harder for newcomers. Too many expats face discrimination when searching for housing in Estonia. We created a platform where every listing is verified to be expat-friendly, connecting open-minded landlords with people looking for a place to call home.
about.title: About Xpatly
about.values_body: Transparency, respect, and inclusivity guide every listing, feature, and interaction.
about.why_direct_text: Connect directly with property owners and landlords. No middlemen, no hidden fees—just transparent, honest communication.
about.why_no_discrimination_text: Every property on Xpatly pledges to be expat-friendly. We have zero tolerance for discrimination based on nationality, language, or origin.
about.why_verified_text: All listings are reviewed and verified by our team. Only properties that genuinely welcome expats make it to our platform.

blog.body: We are preparing practical articles in three languages to help you navigate housing in Estonia.
blog.coming_up: Fresh posts are on the way
blog.lead: Guides for expats, landlord tips, and platform updates.
blog.title: Blog

contact.general_inquiries_text: Questions about listings, how to use the platform, or general information.
contact.lead: We are here to help with listings, support, or partnerships.
contact.partnerships_text: Interested in partnering with Xpatly or collaborating on housing initiatives?
contact.reach_body: Have questions or need assistance? Our team is ready to help. We typically respond within 24 hours.
contact.support_text: Need help with your account, listings, or experiencing technical issues?
contact.title: Contact

faq.contact_us: Our team is here to help. Get in touch and we'll respond as soon as possible.

for_landlords.a1: After creating an account, go to your dashboard and click 'Create New Listing'. Fill in property details, upload high-quality photos, set your price and availability, and publish. Your listing will appear immediately on our platform.
for_landlords.a2: Be as detailed as possible! Include accurate property size, number of rooms, amenities, utilities included, deposit requirements, lease terms, and clear photos. Mention if you speak English and whether pets are allowed. Detailed listings get more inquiries.
for_landlords.a3: Interested tenants will send you messages through our platform. You'll receive email notifications and can respond directly through your dashboard. We recommend responding within 24 hours to maintain high engagement.
for_landlords.a4: Absolutely! Go to your dashboard, find your listing under 'My Listings', and click 'Edit'. You can update any information, add or remove photos, change pricing, or mark the property as rented/sold at any time.
for_landlords.q1: How do I list my property?
for_landlords.q2: What information should I include in my listing?
for_landlords.q4: Can I edit my listing after publishing?

for_tenants.a1: Use our advanced search on the homepage or search page. Filter by location (city, region, settlement), price range, number of rooms, property type, and special features like 'expat-friendly' or 'pets allowed'. You can view results as a list or on an interactive map.
for_tenants.a2: Properties marked as 'expat-friendly' typically have English-speaking landlords, accept tenants without Estonian language skills, are furnished or semi-furnished, and may offer flexible lease terms suitable for international professionals and students.
for_tenants.a3: Click on any listing to view full details, then use the 'Send Message' button to contact the landlord directly through our secure messaging system. Make sure you're logged in to send messages. Landlords typically respond within 24-48 hours.
for_tenants.a4: Yes! Click the heart icon on any listing to add it to your favorites. You can view all your saved properties in your dashboard under 'My Favorites' for easy comparison and future reference.
for_tenants.q1: How do I search for properties?
for_tenants.q3: How do I contact a landlord?
for_tenants.q4: Can I save my favorite listings?

getting_started.a1: Xpatly is a housing platform designed specifically for expats and locals in Estonia. We make it easy to find apartments and houses for rent or sale, with a focus on expat-friendly features like English-speaking landlords, pet-friendly properties, and transparent pricing.
getting_started.a2: Yes! Browsing listings and contacting landlords is completely free for tenants and buyers. Landlords can list their first property for free. We may introduce premium features in the future for enhanced visibility and additional services.
getting_started.a3: Click the 'Register' button in the top navigation. Fill in your email, create a password, and verify your email address. You can then complete your profile with additional information to help landlords understand your needs better.
getting_started.q3: How do I create an account?

payments_safety.a1: Xpatly is a listing platform only - we do not process rental or sales payments. All financial transactions (deposits, rent, purchase payments) are arranged directly between tenants and landlords. We recommend using bank transfers and always getting receipts.
payments_safety.a2: Yes. We take privacy seriously. Your email and phone number are never publicly displayed. Only registered users can send you messages, and you control who sees your contact details. Read our Privacy Policy for full details on data protection.
payments_safety.a3: Never send money before viewing a property in person or via video call. Be cautious of deals that seem too good to be true. Verify the landlord's identity and ownership documents. Never wire money abroad or use untraceable payment methods. Report suspicious listings to our support team immediately.
payments_safety.q1: How do payments work on Xpatly?

technical.a1: Yes! Xpatly is fully mobile-optimized and works on all devices. For the best experience, you can install our Progressive Web App (PWA) to your home screen. Just visit Xpatly on your mobile browser and tap 'Add to Home Screen' when prompted.
technical.a2: Xpatly works best on modern browsers including Chrome, Safari, Firefox, and Edge. We recommend keeping your browser updated to the latest version for optimal performance and security.
technical.a3: We appreciate your feedback! Please use our Contact page to report bugs or suggest new features. Be as detailed as possible - include screenshots if relevant. We review all feedback and prioritize improvements based on community input.
technical.q1: Can I use Xpatly on my phone?
technical.q3: I found a bug or have a feature suggestion. How can I report it?

faq.title: FAQ

imprint.lead: Legal and company information for Xpatly.
imprint.title: Imprint

privacy.data_body: Contact details, listing information, and usage data needed to keep the platform secure.
privacy.lead: We protect your data and use it only to deliver the service you expect.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.usage_body: To run searches, deliver alerts, prevent abuse, and improve Xpatly. You can request deletion at any time.

terms.acceptance_body: By accessing and using Xpatly, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this platform.
terms.accounts_body: To publish listings or use certain features, you must create an account. You agree to:
terms.accounts_point1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
terms.accounts_point2: Maintain and promptly update your account information
terms.accounts_point3: Keep your password secure and confidential
terms.accounts_point4: Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
terms.changes_body: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of Xpatly after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. We encourage you to review this page periodically.
terms.contact_body: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
terms.disputes_body: Any disputes between landlords and tenants must be resolved directly between the parties. Xpatly is not a party to rental agreements and has no obligation to mediate or resolve disputes. However, we encourage users to report fraudulent or abusive behavior.
terms.ip_body: The Xpatly platform, including its design, logo, text, graphics, and software, is owned by Xpatly and protected by intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of content you upload, but grant Xpatly a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute your listings on our platform.
terms.law_body: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Estonia. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Estonia.
terms.lead: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.
terms.liability_body: Xpatly acts as a platform connecting landlords and tenants. We do not own, manage, or control the properties listed on our platform. We are not responsible for the accuracy of listings, the conduct of users, rental agreements, or disputes between parties.
terms.liability_disclaimer: XPATLY IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. WE DISCLAIM ALL LIABILITY FOR DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE PLATFORM.
terms.listings_body: When you create a listing on Xpatly, you represent and warrant that:
terms.listings_point1: You have the legal right to list the property
terms.listings_point2: All information provided is accurate, truthful, and not misleading
terms.listings_point3: Your listing complies with all applicable housing laws and regulations in Estonia
terms.listings_point4: You will not discriminate against any prospective tenant based on protected characteristics
terms.listings_point5: Images and content you upload do not infringe on any third-party intellectual property rights
terms.moderation_body: Xpatly reserves the right to verify, review, approve, reject, or remove any listing or user content at our sole discretion. We may require email or phone verification before allowing listings to be published. Listings that violate these terms or applicable laws will be removed without notice.
terms.prohibited_body: You may not use Xpatly to:
terms.prohibited_point1: Post fraudulent, misleading, or deceptive listings
terms.prohibited_point2: Engage in discriminatory practices against expats or any protected group
terms.prohibited_point3: Harass, threaten, or abuse other users
terms.prohibited_point4: Attempt to circumvent the platform to avoid fees or contact users off-platform inappropriately
terms.prohibited_point5: Scrape, data mine, or use automated tools to extract content without permission
terms.prohibited_point6: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
terms.termination_body: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violating these Terms, engaging in fraudulent activity, or for any other reason at our discretion. Upon termination, your right to use Xpatly immediately ceases.
terms.title: Terms of Service
